data.name: Curving Over It with Evgeny Podoynikov
data.detailed_description:
This game is for those
who loves to suffer.

Inspired by "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "Golfing Over It with Alva Majo"

  • Overcome obstacles by throwing a ball, which is not as simple as it might seem.
  • Gameplay takes from 2 hours before your patience expires. If you do it in less than 2 hours, I will be very surprised and annoyed.
  • So that you do not get bored, sometimes I'll cheer you up, or vice versa.
  • Have I already mentioned patience? You will need it. Be ready to lose everything, believe me, it hurts.
  • If you are not timid, then you can go through the game and get useless achievements for this, with them everyone will know you a bit better.
  • 1 level. 3 locations. ∞ pain.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) Pentium P6000 1.87 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4400 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, there is a three-letter russian obscene word denoting a male reproductive organ.
